messages.message:
Home Screen Apps: can the home screen default to displaying customer apps vs. ones Instabase has published?

Context: trying to pre-load some chatbots for a customer who is beginning a commercial trial but they have to navigate to all apps (vs. seeing the newest ones on the home screen). The current home screen apps (ICD-10 Code, ICD-10. Code German, Underwriter Assistant) aren't applicable to their business.
are these chatbots published within this customer’s organization? if so, they can select “Apps from my organization” at the top
I think the ask here is that the main home page shows the apps created by them, without forcing them to navigate into the hub section
^ much more eloquent than me but spot on yes!
At the moment this isn't supported, but with our planned homepage refresh we will have a recents section which will iclude apps a user has recently tried so that the home page becomes more customized
